items.sentence: Why didn\'t you tell me you could speak French?
Tom thought that it would be fun to go sailing.
Tom thought that nobody knew what he was doing.
Tom told Mary that everything would be perfect.
Tom told Mary that he could predict the future.
Tom never bothered to learn the local language.
Tom said he wanted to take some pictures of us.
I\'m thinking of buying a house on Park Street.
I\'m trying to learn as much as I can from Tom.
He told me that his grandfather is over ninety.
Tom wanted to know when we\'re going to Boston.
Would you guys like to share an orange with me?
I wish you would shut the door when you go out.
I wonder what the minimum wage is in Australia.
You\'re the only woman I\'ve ever really loved.
You\'re the very person I\'ve been looking for.
You\'re three years older than me, aren\'t you?
I went bungee jumping for the first time today.
I went to Boston for 5 days on a business trip.
Tom thinks it\'s time for Mary to ask for help.
Tom thinks that he\'s better than other people.
Don\'t you want to see what\'s inside the cave?
Mary\'s smiling face showed that she was happy.
Everyone wants to know what\'s going to happen.
Why would you ever want to work on Wall Street?
You should go out for a walk with the children.
I\'ve been studying French for three years now.
I think we\'re going to have problems with Tom.

Have you ever thought about committing suicide?
Tom wants to ask you about your trip to Boston.

I\'m glad I wasn\'t the one who had to do that.
You won\'t be needing that where you\'re going.

Do you usually go to the country in the summer?
Tom didn\'t seem to be happy with our decision.

Tom didn\'t tell me that you were so beautiful.

I\'m still not happy with how things are going.
I\'m sure Tom is aware Mary is in the hospital.
